label: Blankets and Throws
description: Products used for warmth and comfort, typically made of fabric and used on beds, sofas, or for outdoor activities.

subcategories.label: Fleece Blankets
subcategories.description: Soft and lightweight blankets made of synthetic material.

subcategories.label: Wool Blankets
subcategories.description: Blankets made of wool, known for their warmth and durability.

subcategories.label: Electric Blankets
subcategories.description: Blankets that use electricity to generate heat.

subcategories.label: Personalized Blankets
subcategories.description: Blankets that can be customized with personal photos or text.

subcategories.label: Throws
subcategories.description: Small blankets used for decoration or to add warmth to a room.
